mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sec_doctor_multipoint ( id, STATUS, disabled, createtime, doctor_id, hospital_id, department_id ) VALUES ( #{id},1,0,now(),#{doctorId},#{hospitalId},#{departmentId}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id = #{id}, STATUS = 1, disabled = 0, createtime = now(), doctor_id = #{doctorId}, hospital_id = #{hospitalId}, department_id = #{departmentId}
